abstract: Verizon Communications announced earnings of $1.07 billion in the fourth quarter, but said its traditional telephone business remained a drag on the bottom line.
snippet: Verizon Communications announced earnings of $1.07 billion in the fourth quarter, but said its traditional telephone business remained a drag on the bottom line.
lead_paragraph: That old phone cord is tying Verizon down.

headline.main: Cellular Unit and Internet Stand Out for Verizon
headline.print_headline: Cellular Unit And Internet Stand Out For Verizon
